page.title: 17Morwenstow - "Hamlets"
page.content: A parish newsletter called "Hamlets" is published monthly by the Parish Council. Parishioners contribute articles and it is edited by the Parish Clerk. Copy is typed by a volunteer. The first edition was published in January 1981, and to date fifty issues have been published and the format has remained unchanged. Regular items in- clude an editorial, Council news by the Chairman, a sermon by the vicar or Methodist minister, forthcoming events and a crossword. Articles on wild life football, bowls , billiards, snooker, badminton and skittles are also incl- uded. Various organisations and socie- ties report on their activities and the nespaper is also used as a general forum. It is delivered free to every house- hold by councillors of volunteers.
